title: Example Podcast Episode
description: A well-formed example of a Podcast Assembly Plan that adheres to the schema

segments.prompt: upbeat energetic intro music with electronic beats

segments.speaker: HOST
segments.text: Welcome to our show! Today we're exploring an amazing topic that you won't want to miss.

segments.speaker: HOST
segments.text: We'll dive deep into the details and hear from some fascinating guests.

segments.speaker: GUEST
segments.text: Thanks for having me! I'm excited to share my insights on this topic.

segments.speaker: HOST
segments.text: Let's start by discussing the history behind this fascinating subject.

segments.speaker: GUEST
segments.text: The origins date back several decades, and it's evolved significantly over time.
This episode is brought to you by our sponsor. Check them out for amazing deals!

segments.speaker: HOST
segments.text: Now let's look at some practical applications and real-world examples.

segments.speaker: GUEST
segments.text: One of the most interesting examples is how this has impacted everyday life.

segments.speaker: HOST
segments.text: That's a great point. Can you tell us more about the future implications?

segments.speaker: GUEST
segments.text: Looking ahead, I think we'll see some exciting developments in this space.

segments.speaker: HOST
segments.text: Thank you so much for joining us today! This has been incredibly insightful.

segments.speaker: GUEST
segments.text: My pleasure! Thanks for having me.

segments.prompt: uplifting outro music with a positive vibe
